Package com.pacman.model.managers

Class GhostManager

java.lang.Object
com.pacman.model.managers.GhostManager
public class GhostManager
extends java.lang.Object
Class used to manage ghost. Creates ghosts (randoms empty tile, random color) Store ghost in a list. Calls their update and draw methods.

  • Field Summary

    Fields

    (package private) java.lang.String[] colors
    Array with available colors for ghosts
    private java.util.ArrayList<Ghost> ghostList
    List of ghosts
    (package private) java.util.Random random
    Random generator for generating position, direction and color of ghost
